260054.「やあ こんにちは。\n キミも トランプケース希望の お客さんだね？\n ……:
Hello there, you are another customer who wants a Tycoon Card Case, aren't you? Well, first of all, I should introduce myself. I'm
Tycoon Club Member Pugol, and I'm not just a bunch of rich people, you know the game Tycoon? Have you heard of Tycoon? I want to
spread it here in Astoltia. But Tycoon has a lot of additional rules. I'm trying to rearrange the rules so that everyone can enjoy
the game together. Then it spread through the mouth commissions. Now we have a daily Tycoon tournament called Ranked Match. You can
compete with your skills in Ranked Match, which has different rules for each day. Or you can play with your friends with your favorite
rules. We want you to have fun playing Tycoon too. So, please accept this first.

260056.「やあ <pc>さん。\n 最近 がんばってるみたいじゃないか。\n<bw_br:
Hey <pc>. I see you've been working
hard lately.
<bw_break>

260057.「やあ <pc>さん。\n ここ最近で いろいろなことがあったぜ。\n<bw_b:
Hey <pc>. A lot has happened in the
last few days.
<bw_break>

260058.「……っと。\n それじゃあ さっそく……\n<bw_break>:
Woohoo.... Well then, let's get started...
<bw_break>

260059.「<%sM_RANK>まで 上がったようだから\n 私からのお祝いだ。昇段報酬を:
You've made it to <%sM_RANK>, so I
congratulate you. I'll give you a promotion
reward.
<bw_break>

260060.「……っと思ったが だめだ。\n どうぐかばんが いっぱいじゃないか。\n<br:
But no, my item bag is full. If you want a
reward, go make room in your item bag.
<bw_break>

260063.「……っと思ったけど ちょっとキミ。\n お金がいっぱいで 持ちきれないみたいだ:
I'd like to, but it looks like you've got too much money to carry. I'm a little envious... if you want to get paid, go ahead and reduce
the money. Until then, I'll wait for you.

260064.「第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦は 終了したぜ。\n もしも ラ:
The <%dM_EVENT_NUMBER>th Ranked Match is over.
I would have given you something if you were
ranked higher...
<bw_break>

260065.「……ってあれ！\n <pc>さん ランクインしてるよ！\n すごいじゃないか。:
...and that one! <pc> You're ranked!
That's great...you're ranked...
<bw_break>

260069.「今は 第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦が 開催中だ。\n エント:
The <%dM_EVENT_NUMBER>th Ranked Match is going on right now. You can join from Tycoon Card Case since you've already entered.
starts at <%sM_RANK>. If you have any questions, please ask in the "Explanation" section.

260070.「今は 大富豪決定戦 <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME>が\n 開催中だ。\:
Tycoon Playoffs <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME> is going on right now. Please note that you will not be able to participate in Ranked Matches during
the Tycoon Playoffs. You can enter the competition from the Tycoon Card Case. You can start from <%sM_RANK> rank. For more detailed
explanation, please refer to the Explanation section.

260071.「第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦が 開催中だ。\n ここでは 報:
The <%dM_EVENT_NUMBER>th Ranked Match is
underway. Here you can see the rewards. What
are you going to do?
<break>

260073.「大富豪決定戦 <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME>が 開催中だ。\n ここで:
The current Tycoon tournament
<%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME> is underway. You can see
the rewards here. What do you want to do?
<break>

260074.「まだ ランキングは 確認できないぜ？\n 始まったばかりだからな。\n<bw_:
I can't confirm the rankings yet, okay? We're
just getting started.
<bw_break>

260075.「段位戦は だいじなものの 中にある\n トランプケースから参加できるぜ。\n:
You can participate in Ranked Matches from the
Tycoon Card Case in the Key Items section. See
you later!
<end>

260076.「<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>日に\n 新しいイベントを:
I will start a new event on
<tm%dM_TIME>MONTH<td%dM_TIME>. You can count
on it.
<end>

260077.「大富豪決定戦 <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME>は\n <tm%nM_TI:
Please keep in mind that the <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME>
is scheduled to end on <tm%dM_TIME>/<td%dM_TIME> at <th%dM_TIME>:<ti%02dM_TIME> JST.
<end>

260078.「どの説明を 聞きたいんだ？\n 私が 教えてやるよ。\n<break>:
Which explanation do you want to hear? I'll
tell you.
<break>

260079.「他にも何か 説明を聞くかい？\n 私が 教えてやるよ。\n<break>:
Anything else you want to know about
Explanation? I'll tell you.
<break>

260080.「場に出されたカードよりも 強いカードを出す。\n それが 大富豪の 基本ルール:
The card that is stronger than the card that is dealt is played. In Tycoon Club rules, four players play Tycoon. The ruthless element of
luck and the epic games against your opponents... it's addicting, isn't it? If you want to know more, check out the Tycoon Card
Case.

260081.「段位戦では 私が決めた 日替わりルールで\n 冒険者４人と マッチングして 遊:
In Ranked Match, you will be matched with four other adventurers to play according to my daily rules. When you join Ranked Match, you
will play three games in a row. The winner will be decided by the total number of points. We also offer rewards for advancement, so play
as many games as you like, accumulate Rank Points, and keep trying to get higher and higher.

260082.「段位とは 段位戦での キミの強さを\n 示すものだ。\n<br>\n「実力の近:
Dan rank indicates how strong you are in Ranked Match. To play with opponents who are close in ability, matching is divided into
three categories: 1-dan to 6-dan, 7-dan to 9-dan, and 10-dan and above. Rank Points are determined by your rank and Ranked Match
ranking. The higher your rank, the less Rank Points you get. You can check how many Rank Points you can get for your rank on the Tycoon
Card Case. Ranks are reset for each Ranked Match. Your next rank will be determined by your previous rank. If you have not
participated in any Ranked Matches before the last Ranked Match, your rank will be reset and you will be rewarded according to your rank
again.

260083.「段位戦には 段位戦ポイントの\n 獲得量を競う ランキングがある。\n 上位に:
In Ranked Match, there is a ranking system to
compete for Rank Points. If you rank high, you
will be rewarded.
<bw_break>

260084.「トランプポイントを 渡してくれたら\n 私の トランプコレクションの中から\n:
If you give me Card Points, I will exchange them for a card of your choice from my Cards collection, and you can get Card Points for
playing Tycoon in Ranked Match or in a companion match. There is also a furniture that allows you to play Tycoon, but you will
get the same amount of Card Points as in a friendly match.

260857.「なんと！ <%nM_RANKING>位だ！\n これほどの偉業を 成しとげるな:
Oh my! <%dM_RANKING>! I'm amazed that you
could accomplish such a feat!
<me 73><bw_break>

260858.「なんと！ <%nM_RANKING>位だ！\n キミは 見かけによらず 大した:
What a surprise! <You are a bigger man than
you look!
<me 72><bw_break>

260859.「なんと！ <%nM_RANKING>位だ！\n がんばったじゃないか。\n<m:
Oh my! You're in <%dM_RANKING>! You did your
best.
<me 71><bw_break>

260860.「これは <%nM_RANK_UPPER>～<%nM_RANK_LOWER>位ま:
This is a reward for players from
<%dM_RANK_UPPER> to <%dM_RANK_LOWER>. Please
take it!
<end>

262173.「他にも 用があるなら\n また 話しかけてくれよな。\n<end>:
If you need me for anything else, you'll have
to talk to me again.
<end>

262174.「そうだ。もう 次の段位戦が\n 始まってるぜ。エントリーしたいなら\n また:
That's right. The next Ranked Match has
already started. Talk to me again if you want
to enter.
<end>

<speed=0><color_yellow>New Ranked Matches will be held

262269.「すまないが 大富豪のイベントは 休止中だ。\n しばらくしてから また来てくれ:

You already have that <%sM_TRUMP_NAME>
design, so you don't need this.
<end>

270348.「大富豪決定戦は 期間限定の大会だ。\n 基本的な遊びは いつもの段位戦と一緒だ:
Tycoon Playoffs is a limited-time tournament. The basic play is the same as in a regular Ranked Match, but there are some differences
that I will explain. First of all, the rules of Tycoon Playoffs do not change during the event. They do not change daily, so be
careful. Secondly, Tycoon Playoffs requires you to play against a special background. You won't be able to use your own backgrounds, but
we hope you enjoy the different atmosphere. Also, please keep in mind that there are five ranks, from D to S. If you are in the S rank,
you will be matched up as an advanced player. We also have rank achievement rewards and ranking rewards, so keep playing and aim for
the top. Finally, please note that during the Tycoon Playoffs, you will not be able to participate in the regular Ranked Matches.

272405.「<%sM_RANK>ランクまで 上がったから\n 私からのお祝いだ。ランク達成:
Now that you've hit Rank <%sM_RANK>,
here's a little reward for ya. A Rank
Achievement reward, if you will.
<bw_break>
